articles.title: Copa America: Gabriel Jesus sent off for flying karate kick but Brazil still edge Chile - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Flying Jesus caught a Chilean defender high with a wild karate kick and was sent off, but Brazil held on to reach the Copa America semifinals.
articles.content: Defending Copa America champions Brazil defended strongly with 10 men to advance to the semifinals with a 1-0 win against Chile on Saturday (NZ time). Substitute Lucas Paqueta scored the only goal of… [+3443 chars]
